titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Madame C. J. Walker should be recognized for her achievements in business, her inventions, and her commitment to the African-American community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: 2/27/2003--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Madame C. J. Walker should be recognized as one of history's greatest businesswomen and role models for the Nation's young people.
